entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
